messages.subject: New York Unschoolers??
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all! I just wanted to check and see if any of you are un-schooling in NY? It looks like we may be headed in that direction, and I d love to know I m not
messages.messageBody:
Hi all!
I just wanted to check and see if any of you
are un-schooling in NY? It looks like we may be
headed in that direction, and I'd love to know
I'm not alone!!
I noticed a group near the Finger Lakes region,
but we'll be nearer Rochester...
My monitor bit the dust, so I'm having to join
you sporadically as I can get to the library:(
Please feel free to e-mail me privately as I'm
catching the discussions via digest version at the
library and don't have time to do much more than
skim right now...
Thanks!!
Tamara countrygal@...
